description: 50 pertanyaan lebih kompleks, seperti pengalaman pribadi, opini, dan deskripsi.

questions.question: Can you describe your daily routine?
What are your hobbies and why do you enjoy them?
Can you tell me about your favorite book or movie?
What do you usually do on weekends?
What are your goals for the future?
Can you describe a memorable trip you have taken?
What is your favorite holiday and how do you celebrate it?
Can you explain a skill or activity you recently learned?
What are the most important qualities of a good friend?
Can you describe your favorite type of music and why you like it?
What is your dream job, and why?
What is something interesting about your hometown?
Can you tell me about a challenge you faced and how you overcame it?
What are some popular dishes or foods in your country?
Can you describe a typical day at your school or job?
What is your favorite way to relax or unwind?
Can you describe a person you admire and why you admire them?
What is one thing you want to achieve this year?
Can you tell me about your favorite childhood memory?
What is a skill you want to learn and why?
What is your favorite way to spend time with your family?
Can you describe your favorite season and why you like it?
What is something unique about your culture or tradition?
What do you usually eat for lunch or dinner?
Can you describe an interesting place you have visited recently?
What do you usually do during your vacation?
Can you explain how to cook a simple dish?
What are the most important things in your life?
What is your favorite way to exercise or stay fit?
Can you tell me about a recent celebration or party you attended?
What is your favorite way to celebrate your birthday?
What are your favorite outdoor activities?
Can you describe your ideal weekend?
What is your favorite kind of weather?
What do you usually do during a long weekend?
What is a holiday or tradition you enjoy the most?
Can you describe a restaurant or cafe you like?
What is your favorite app or website and why?
Can you describe a typical meal in your country?
What is a book or article you read recently?
Can you describe your dream vacation?
What is a fun activity you like to do with friends?
What do you like about your favorite singer or band?
What is your favorite mode of transportation and why?
Can you describe a famous person from your country?
What do you think is the best way to learn English?
What is your favorite snack or dessert?
What is a city or country you want to live in?
Can you tell me about a time you helped someone?
What is your favorite way to relax after a busy day?
